title: Market outlook for 30/09/2015
content:
Nifty closed up 47.60 points (0.61%) at 7843.30 while Future closed at 7875.85, premium of 32.55 points.

Bank Nifty closed up 180.90 points (1.06%) at 17281.20 while Future closed at 17387.85, premium of 106.65 points.


FII sold huge in Cash (Net sell 1112.59 Crore)
FII bought in stock future, index option but sold in stock future (Net buy 3246.35 Crore)
DII bought in Cash (Net buy 876.20 Crore)
Most Active Nifty Call Option: 8000 and 8100.
Most Active Nifty Put Options: 7700 and 7500.
Advance Decline for the day was 672:807.
McClellan's oscillator for NSE at +11.
